alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:55AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, George and Greene Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...The Flood Warning remains in effect... The Flood Warning continues for the Leaf Near Mclain. * From this afternoon until further notice. * At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.9 feet. * Flood stage is 18.0 feet. * Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 23.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. * Impact...At 24.0 feet, Some county roads in the area will become flooded. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
